entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
